content: It seems that the Pset 5 section 2.4 says to use 2 LSBs while the template document section "reveal_color_image" says to use 3 LSBs. I am using 2, is that okay? Thanks!
subject: Number of LSBs for RGB in PSET 5

content: It has to be 3 LSBs otherwise it will not pass the tester
3 is the right number, it is a typo in the pset file.
